textDoubleList.text: Graduated at Politecnico di Milano, he worked for more than 8 years in digital agencies and media company (Connexia, Bitmama Reply, Condé Nast) as Digital Art Director and UI Designer.
He curated a series of engaging and easy-to-use online and offline products, with a focus on websites, applications, digital contents and brand identity.

Condé Nast (La Cucina Italiana, Glamour, Vogue), RCS (Giro d’Italia), Prada, Dsquared2, Trussardi, Nespresso, Mondadori, Zegna, Volkswagen, Yamaha, Diadora, Barilla, Interspar, Zambon, Antonia, Salini, Reply, Santoni, Intimissimi, Voiello, Bosch, Faraone, Azimut.

Digital Art Direction
UI Design & Prototyping
Graphic Design
Branding & Logo Design
Print & Editorial Design
Motion Graphics
Photography
